div.p: On June 13, 2019, the State Board of Education officially awarded Trinidad School District 1 for $15, 549,663 Building Excellent Schools Today (B.E.S.T.) grant for the middle school renovation project. The District also received a waiver for a 29% local match of $4,509,402. The only way to come up with the local match and access $11,040,260 FREE marijuana money is by passing a bond issue in November.

h3.a: Regular Board of Education Meeting via Zoom

div.p: If you wish to join the meeting using the link below, the District respectfully ask you to sign in with your full name. Due to

article.class: elementor-post elementor-grid-item post-6181 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-uncategorized

h3.a: TMS Student Assignment Pick Up and Drop Off – April 23, 2020

div.p: Assignment pick up and drop for all students who are working on hard copy packets will take place on Thursday, April 23rd from 11:00 a.m.
